about_the_game:
About the game

"Cat And Life" is a casual healing simulation business game developed by two people.
Here, you will grow up with the cats and experience their joys, sorrows and joys.
You need to provide them with a comfortable living environment, decorate the cat world with cute decorations, feed them with delicious cat food, and build deep relationships with the cute cats.
Create a cat world full of love and warmth.
Here, you will experience the warmth and happiness of being with cats, feel the joy and healing they bring, and enjoy a wonderful time with cats.
I hope everyone can gain the happiness of spending time with cats in this game.


QQ player group: 685514222

short_description: Cat And Life is not just a simulation game, but also a game full of love and care. You need to provide them with a comfortable living environment, decorate their world with cute decorations, feed them with delicious cat food, and create a world full of love and warmth for cats.
